title: US House Members Introduce Bill To Make NOAA A Independent Agency
summary: A group of US House members have introduced a bill seeking to transform the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) into an independent agency while retaining its commercial space responsibilities within the Commerce Department.

title: Firefly Aerospace Purchases Remaining Virgin Orbit Assets
summary: Firefly Aerospace has reached an agreement to acquire the remaining assets of Virgin Orbit as part of Virgin Orbit's ongoing bankruptcy proceedings.

title: Space Force Assigns SpaceX & ULA New Security Missions
summary: The US Space Force launch procurement office has announced that an additional 12 missions have been assigned to SpaceX and United Launch Alliance (ULA) under the National Security Space Launch Phase 2 contract.

title: Space Force extends Palantir’s data-as-a-service contracts
summary: The Space Force awarded data analytics company Palantir $110.3 million in contract extensions for the company’s cloud-based data services.

title: Virgin Galactic To Begin Commercial Operations This Month
summary: Virgin Galactic has announced their are preparing for the first commercial flight of the SpaceShipTwo suborbital vehicle in later this month.

title: Final Ariane 5 Launch Delayed Due To Technical Problems
summary: The final launch of Arianespace's Ariane 5 rocket has been postponded due to a potential problem with the pyrotechnical systems onboard.

title: UK Space Agency prioritizes sustainability
summary: The UK Space Agency is taking steps to encourage and prioritize space sustainability, both domestically and internationally.

title: Despite growing interest in commercial satellite data, industry faces uncertainty
summary: Remote-sensing space companies worry that U.S. defense and intelligence agencies are not adopting commercial products and services at the pace and scale they hoped.

title: NASA Awards Institutional, Maintenance, Operations, and Repair Contract
summary: NASA Awards Institutional, Maintenance, Operations, and Repair Contract

title: NASA Awards Transformational Shared Services Support Contract
summary: NASA has selected COLSA Corporation of Huntsville, Alabama to provide a broad range of support to the NASA Shared Services Center (NSSC). The contract includes support for financial management, human resources, procurement, and other services the NSSC provides.
